DOC.brief_summary: purpose study compare effect physical therapy ( PT ) program oral appliance patient temporomandibular disorder ( TMD ) -related myofascial pain ( MFP ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Effect Physical Therapy With Oral Appliance Temporomandibular Disorder Related Myofascial Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The detail intervention list follow : - physical therapy program group ( PT ) : manual myofascial release craniomandibular system , chin-in exercise self-care education - oral appliance group ( splint ) : custom-made stabilization splint self-care education
DOC.criteria: ( 1 ) 2065 year old female , ( 2 ) diagnose MFP subtype TMD accord Research Diagnostic Criteria TMD ( RDC/TMD ) , ( 3 ) pain duration 3 month , ( 4 ) palpable taut band masseter , ( 5 ) Asymmetrical pain intensity , ( 6 ) subside symptom joint inflammation . ( 1 ) traumatic TMD external impact force , ( 2 ) history traumatic cervical injury , ( 3 ) presence systemic disease , ( 4 ) fibromyalgia , ( 5 ) cointerventions cervical problem TMD study period , ( 6 ) sign psychosomatic illness , ( 7 ) unwilling randomize , ( 8 ) unable wear splint receive intraoral myofascial release , ( 9 ) pregnancy .
